INSERT INTO t_sales_order (order_code,product_price,transport_fare,extra_price,total_price,pay_type_id,operater_id,operate_date, deal_date,taobao_code,customer_name,customer_tel,customer_postcode,customer_district1_id,customer_district2_id,customer_district3_id,customer_address,customer_notes) VALUES (#{orderCode},#{productPrice},#{transportFare},#{extraPrice},#{totalPrice},#{payTypeId},#{operaterId},#{operateDate}, #{dealDate},#{taobaoCode},#{customerName},#{customerTel},#{customerPostcode},#{customerDistrict1Id},#{customerDistrict2Id},#{customerDistrict3Id},#{customerAddress},#{customerNotes})
mapper.select: select s.id,s.order_code,s.product_price,s.transport_fare,s.extra_price,s.total_price,s.pay_type_id, s.operater_id,s.operate_date,s.confirm_id,s.confirm_date,tdss.name as order_state,s.deal_date,s.taobao_code, s.customer_id,s.customer_name,s.customer_tel,s.customer_postcode,s.customer_address,s.customer_notes, (select name from t_district d1 WHERE s.customer_district1_id = d1.id) as customer_district1_name, (select name from t_district d2 WHERE s.customer_district2_id = d2.id) as customer_district2_name, (select name from t_district d3 WHERE s.customer_district3_id = d3.id) as customer_district3_name from t_sales_order s LEFT JOIN t_dict_sales_state tdss ON s.state_flag = tdss.nid
select pod.*,p.bar_code,p.product_code,p.product_name,p.product_unit from t_sales_order_detail pod JOIN t_product p ON pod.product_id = p.id WHERE pod.sales_order_id = #{orderId}
